mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT tmp1.id costId, tmp1.main_order_no, tmp1.order_no, tmp1.amount, tmp1.currency_code, tmp1.change_amount, obct.local_money, tmp1.legal_name, tmp1.legal_id, tmp1.customer_code unit_code, tmp1.customer_name unit_name, tmp1.sub_type, tmp1.is_sum_to_main, tmp1.department_id, tmp1.is_internal, oi.customer_name, oi.biz_code, oi.biz_uname, oi.created_user createUser, oi.create_time, obct.money_type, IFNULL(NULL, 2) AS type FROM order_receivable_cost tmp1 LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_no = tmp1.main_order_no left join order_bill_cost_total obct on obct.cost_id=tmp1.id and obct.money_type=2 where tmp1.status !=1 UNION all SELECT tmp1.id costId, tmp1.main_order_no, tmp1.order_no, tmp1.amount, tmp1.currency_code, tmp1.change_amount, obct.local_money, tmp1.legal_name, tmp1.legal_id, tmp1.customer_code unit_code, tmp1.customer_name unit_name, tmp1.sub_type, tmp1.is_sum_to_main, tmp1.department_id, tmp1.is_internal, oi.customer_name, oi.biz_code, oi.biz_uname, oi.created_user createUser, oi.create_time, obct.money_type, IFNULL(NULL, 1) AS type FROM order_payment_cost tmp1 LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_no = tmp1.main_order_no left join order_bill_cost_total obct on obct.cost_id=tmp1.id and obct.money_type=1 where tmp1.status !=1 ) tmp
